item.description:
On Cinco de Mayo (May 5th), let's party at Jose McIntyre's again...such a cliche but always a good time. It's 200 yards from Coogan's, our Thursday happy hour spot.

You can enjoy their 'special margaritas' and the company of friendly amigos. Since, this is what Vinnie and Luis call one of the amateur drinking days, it will probably be crowded, so get there early if you want a seat to enjoy the festivities.

Dos Equis and Sauza host with entertainment and giveaways.

Jose McIntyre's Appetizer Menu

Check out MBTA or Hop Stop to create your route by public transit. Aquarium (blue line), Haymarket (green & orange lines), State (orange & blue lines), Government Center (blue & green lines), and South Station (red line & commuter rail) subway stations are no more than a five (5) minute walk away.

 

PLEASE MAINTAIN YOUR OWN TAB OR PAY AS YOU ORDER - THANK YOU
item.why: Good times and Good Drinks with the Best drinking buddies.
item.name: Cinco de Mayo at Jose McIntyre's
